main event: A bright light was observed in the sky over Dhahran, Saudi Arabia on October 31, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as oscillating from side to side while moving at high speed., The witness was familiar with local aircraft and ruled it out as one., The sighting lasted approximately 4 to 5 minutes., The object eventually faded from sight, indicating a potential meteor or other astronomical phenomenon., The official evaluation concluded it was likely a meteor based on the object's behavior and characteristics.
witness description: the witness was startled initially but settled down to observe the object closely.
